result.execSummary:
The defendant Shane Steven Rouse was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misappropriate ID Info - Avoid Penalty, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.201(2)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: each other and to any sentence currently being served.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Case called:  3:28 pm
Includes 14CF494, 14CF629, and 15CF195.
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Andrew Morgan.

INITIAL APPEARANCE AND PRELIM ON 15CF195:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
COURT questions defendant re: waiver. 
COURT finds waiver freely and vol. made, probable cause - defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  
Reading Waived.
Plea: NOT GUILTY

PLEA/SENTENCING ON 14CF494,14CF629, and 15CF195:  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves:
14CF494:
Ct. 1 (Child Abuse-Intentionally Cause Harm-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (DC-Repeater)>>DRI.

14CF629:
Ct. 2 (Felon Possess Firearm-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Possess w/Intent-THC)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Maintain Drug Trafficking Place-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 5 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer)>>DRI.

15CF195:
Ct. 2 (Misappropriate ID Info-Avoid Penalty)>>DRI.

PLEA: 
14CF629:
Ct. 1 (Possess w/Intent-Cocaine-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
15CF195:
Ct. 1 (Misappropriate ID Info-Avoid Penalty)>>NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
14CF629:
Ct. 1 (Possess w/Intent-Cocaine-Repeater)>> 8 years WSPS - 3 years IC and 5 years ES. No credit on case. To run concurrent to each other and to any sentence currently being served. Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Full time work/Full time school, AODA and follow up, Absolute sobriety, Court Costs, and that any requisite surcharge if any to be paid. 

15CF195:
Ct. 1 (Misappropriate ID Info-Avoid Penalty)>> 6 years WSPS - 3 years IC and 3 years ES. No credit on case. To run concurrent to each other and to any sentence currently being served. Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Full time work/Full time school, AODA and follow up, Absolute sobriety, Court Costs, and that any requisite surcharge if any to be paid. No objection to programs ERP and SAP. 

Adjourned: 3:43 pm
